headline: Leidos Expands Energy Infrastructure Presence With $2.4B ENTRUST Deal
summary: LDOS is set to buy ENTRUST Solutions Group for $2.4 billion, doubling its energy engineering business and expanding utility infrastructure capabilities.

raw.headline: Leidos Expands Energy Infrastructure Presence With $2.4B ENTRUST Deal
